drug.中释: 使服麻醉药；使服毒品；掺麻醉药于
drug.英释: to give a person or animal a drug, especially in order to make them feel tired or go to sleep, or to make them perform well in a race

care.英释: to be concerned about what happens to someone, because you like or love them

past.英释: up to and beyond a person or place, without stopping

deal.英释: treatment of a particular type that is given or received

rise.英释: an increase in number, amount, or value

peer.英释: to look very carefully at something, especially because you are having difficulty seeing it

risk.英释: to put something in a situation in which it could be lost, destroyed, or harmed

turn.中释: 转弯；变化；(损害或有益于别人的)行为，举动，举止
turn.英释: a sudden or unexpected change that makes a situation develop in a different way

rate.英释: if you rate someone or something, you think they are very good

loss.英释: the fact of no longer having something, or of having less of it than you used to have, or the process by which this happens

site.英释: to place or build something in a particular place

born.中释: (Born)人名；(柬)邦；(英、西、俄、捷、德、瑞典、匈)博恩

seek.英释: to try to achieve or get something

fund.英释: to provide money for an activity, organization, event etc

stay.英释: a limited time of living in a place

term.英释: to use a particular word or expression to name or describe something

cure.中释: 治疗；治愈；[临床] 疗法
cure.英释: a medicine or medical treatment that makes an illness go away

mass.英释: to come together, or to make people or things come together, in a large group

sign.英释: to write your  signature  on something to show that you wrote it, agree with it, or were present

flow.英释: a smooth steady movement of liquid, gas, or electricity

firm.英释: a business or company, especially a small one

sort.英释: to put things in a particular order or arrange them in groups according to size, type etc

wake.英释: the time before or after a funeral when friends and relatives meet to remember the dead person

stop.英释: if an activity comes to a stop, it stops happening

lack.英释: when there is not enough of something, or none of it

rely.英释: If you rely on someone or something, you need them and depend on them in order to live or work properly

game.英释: to play games of chance for money, stakes, etc; gamble

fair.英释: an outdoor event, at which there are large machines to ride on, games to play, and sometimes farm animals being judged and sold

suit.中释: 诉讼；恳求；套装，西装；一套外衣
suit.英释: a set of clothes made of the same material, usually including a jacket with trousers or a skirt

step.英释: to bring your foot down on something

worm.中释: 使蠕动；给除虫；使缓慢前进

bite.中释: 机内测试设备（Built-In Test Equipment）

cope.英释: a long loose piece of clothing worn by priests on special occasions

link.英释: to physically join two or more things, people, or places

town.英释: a large area with houses, shops, offices etc where people live and work, that is smaller than a city and larger than a village

rest.中释: 休息，静止；休息时间；剩余部分；支架
rest.英释: a period of time when you are not doing anything tiring and you can relax or sleep

mode.英释: a particular way or style of behaving, living or doing something

shop.英释: to go to one or more shops to buy things

folk.英释: folk art, stories, customs etc are traditional and typical of the ordinary people who live in a particular area

rail.英释: to complain angrily about something, especially something that you think is very unfair

task.英释: a piece of work that must be done, especially one that is difficult or unpleasant or that must be done regularly

draw.英释: the final result of a game or competition in which both teams or players have the same number of points

deny.中释: 否定，否认；拒绝给予；拒绝…的要求
deny.英释: to say that something is not true, or that you do not believe something

date.中释: 过时；注明日期；始于（某一历史时期）
date.英释: if clothing, art etc dates, it begins to look old-fashioned

gain.英释: to obtain or achieve something you want or need

rose.中释: 起义( rise的过去式)；升起；（数量）增加；休会

boom.英释: a quick increase of business activity

team.英释: to put two things or people together, because they will look good or work well together

vote.中释: 提议，使投票；投票决定；公认
vote.英释: to show which person or party you want, or whether you support a plan, by marking a piece of paper, raising your hand etc

dose.英释: to give someone medicine or a drug

wear.英释: to have a particular expression on your face

duty.中释: 责任；[税收] 关税；职务
duty.英释: something that you have to do because it is morally or legally right

rich.中释: (Rich)人名；(丹)里克；(捷)里赫；(英、西)里奇；(葡、法)里什

join.英释: a place where two parts of an object are connected or fastened together

bush.中释: 如灌木般长得低矮的；粗野的

cite.英释: to give the exact words of something that has been written, especially in order to support an opinion or prove an idea

save.英释: an action in which a player in a game such as football prevents the other team from scoring

seat.中释: 使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职
seat.英释: If you seat yourself somewhere, you sit down

pour.英释: to make a liquid or other substance flow out of or into a container by holding it at an angle

pose.英释: the position in which someone stands or sits, especially in a painting, photograph etc

drop.英释: a very small amount of liquid that falls in a round shape

span.英释: to include all of a period of time

feed.中释: 饲料；饲养；（动物或婴儿的）一餐

weak.中释: [经] 疲软的；虚弱的；无力的；不牢固的

safe.英释: a strong metal box or cupboard with special locks where you keep money and valuable things

debt.英释: a sum of money that a person or organization owes

lean.英释: the condition of inclining from a vertical position

lure.英释: to persuade someone to do something, especially something wrong or dangerous, by making it seem attractive or exciting

file.英释: to keep papers, documents etc in a particular place so that you can find them easily

host.英释: to introduce a radio or television programme

flaw.中释: 使生裂缝，使有裂纹；使无效；使有缺陷
flaw.英释: to make or become blemished, defective, or imperfect

rear.英释: the back part of an object, vehicle, or building, or a position at the back of an object or area

nail.英释: a thin pointed piece of metal with a flat top, which you hit into a surface with a hammer, for example to join things together or to hang something on

beat.中释: 筋疲力尽的；疲惫不堪的

fold.英释: a line made in paper or material when you fold one part of it over another

room.中释: 为…提供住处；租房，合住；投宿，住宿；留…住宿
room.英释: to rent and live in a room somewhere

miss.中释: 女士，小姐，年轻未婚女子
miss.英释: used in front of the family name of a woman who is not married to address her politely, to write to her, or to talk about her

rage.英释: to feel very angry about something and show this in the way you behave or speak

race.中释: 使参加比赛；和…竞赛；使急走，使全速行进
race.英释: to compete against someone or something in a race

wild.英释: if plants run wild, they grow a lot in an uncontrolled way

rock.英释: to make the future of something seem less certain or steady than it was before, especially because of problems or changes

prey.中释: 捕食；牺牲者；被捕食的动物
prey.英释: an animal, bird etc that is hunted and eaten by another animal

wait.英释: a period of time in which you wait for something to happen, someone to arrive etc

wage.英释: money you earn that is paid according to the number of hours, days, or weeks that you work

fell.中释: [林] 一季所伐的木材；折缝；兽皮

meat.英释: the flesh of animals and birds eaten as food

path.英释: a track that has been made deliberately or made by many people walking over the same ground

stem.英释: to stop something from happening, spreading, or developing

loom.中释: 可怕地出现；朦胧地出现；隐约可见
loom.英释: to appear as a large unclear shape, especially in a threatening way

spur.英释: to make an improvement or change happen faster

pace.英释: to walk first in one direction and then in another many times, especially because you are nervous

inch.英释: to move very slowly in a particular direction, or to make something do this

evil.英释: cruel or morally bad behaviour in general

hook.英释: to bend your finger, arm, or leg, especially so that you can pull or hold something else

cool.英释: used to tell someone to stop being angry, violent etc

peak.英释: used to talk about the best, highest, or greatest level or amount of something

dare.英释: said to warn someone not to do something because it makes you angry

toll.英释: if a large bell tolls, or if you toll it, it keeps ringing slowly, especially to show that someone has died

hero.英释: a man who is admired for doing something extremely brave

pipe.英释: to make a musical sound, using a pipe

vice.英释: serving in the place of or as a deputy for

rush.中释: 使冲；突袭；匆忙地做；飞跃
rush.英释: to attack a person or place suddenly and in a group

urge.中释: 强烈的欲望，迫切要求；推动力

bulk.中释: 使扩大，使形成大量；使显得重要

belt.中释: 用带子系住；用皮带抽打
belt.英释: to fasten something with a belt

burn.英释: an injury caused by fire, heat, the light of the sun, or acid

gate.英释: to provide with a gate or gates

gasp.英释: when you take in a breath suddenly in a way that can be heard, especially because you are surprised or in pain

mood.英释: the way you feel at a particular time

hall.中释: 过道，门厅，走廊；会堂；食堂；学生宿舍；大厅，前厅；娱乐中心，会所
hall.英释: the area just inside the door of a house or other building, that leads to other rooms

shot.中释: 射击（shoot的过去式和过去分词）

rank.英释: to arrange objects in a line or row

hire.英释: to pay money to borrow something for a short period of time

rain.英释: if it rains, drops of water fall from clouds in the sky

trap.中释: 陷阱；圈套；[建] 存水湾
trap.英释: a piece of equipment for catching animals

cent.中释: 分；一分的硬币；森特（等于半音程的百分之一）
cent.英释: 1/100th of the standard unit of money in some countries. For example, there are 100 cents in one dollar or in one  euro  : symbol ¢.

fuel.英释: a substance such as coal, gas, or oil that can be burned to produce heat or energy

vain.中释: 徒劳的；自负的；无结果的；无用的
vain.英释: someone who is vain is too proud of their good looks, abilities, or position – used to show disapproval

cast.中释: 投掷，抛；铸件，[古生] 铸型；演员阵容；脱落物
cast.英释: all the people who perform in a play, film etc

cash.英释: If you cash a cheque, you exchange it at a bank for the amount of money that it is worth

cake.英释: if a substance cakes, it forms a thick hard layer when it dries

calm.英释: a situation or time that is quiet and peaceful

fume.英释: Fumes are the unpleasant and often unhealthy smoke and gases that are produced by fires or by things such as chemicals, fuel, or cooking

oral.英释: a spoken test, especially in a foreign language

walk.英释: When you walk, you move forward by putting one foot in front of the other in a regular way

bore.英释: something that is not interesting to you or that annoys you

stun.中释: 昏迷；打昏；惊倒；令人惊叹的事物

boot.英释: a type of shoe that covers your whole foot and the lower part of your leg

july.英释: July is the seventh month of the year in the Western calendar

june.英释: June is the sixth month of the year in the Western calendar

deep.英释: a long way into or below the surface of something

dock.英释: if a ship docks, or if the captain docks it, it sails into a dock so that it can unload

doom.英释: to make someone or something certain to fail, die, be destroyed etc

knee.英释: to hit someone with your knee

pair.英释: to put people or things into groups of two, or to form groups of two

push.中释: 推，决心；大规模攻势；矢志的追求

clue.中释: 为…提供线索；为…提供情况

glue.英释: a sticky substance used for joining things together

mask.英释: to hide your feelings or the truth about a situation

dust.英释: to clean the dust from a surface by moving something such as a soft cloth across it

army.英释: the part of a country’s military force that is trained to fight on land in a war

hair.中释: 毛发的；护理毛发的；用毛发制成的

dumb.中释: 哑的，无说话能力的；不说话的，无声音的
dumb.英释: unable to speak, because you are angry, surprised, shocked etc

clip.中释: 剪；剪掉；缩短；给…剪毛（或发）用别针别在某物上，用夹子夹在某物上
clip.英释: to cut small amounts of something in order to make it tidier

nest.英释: to build or use a nest

film.中释: 在…上覆以薄膜；把…拍成电影
film.英释: to use a camera to record a story or real events so that it can be shown in the cinema or on television

till.英释: to prepare land for growing crops

coal.英释: a hard black mineral which is dug out of the ground and burnt to produce heat

bind.中释: 捆绑；困境；讨厌的事情；植物的藤蔓

hole.中释: 凿洞，穿孔；（高尔夫球等）进洞

copy.英释: something that is made to be exactly like another thing

cook.英释: someone who prepares and cooks food as their job

core.英释: If you core a fruit, you remove its core

dark.英释: when there is no light, especially because the sun has gone down

slip.中释: 串行线路接口协议，是旧式的协议（Serial Line Interface Protocol）

dirt.中释: 污垢，泥土；灰尘，尘土；下流话
dirt.英释: any substance that makes things dirty, such as mud or dust

herd.英释: to bring people together in a large group, especially roughly

odds.英释: In betting, odds are expressions with numbers such as "10 to 1" and "7 to 2" that show how likely something is thought to be, for example, how likely a particular horse is to lose or win a race

pink.中释: 粉红的；比较激进的；石竹科的；脸色发红的

toss.中释: 投掷；使…不安；突然抬起；使…上下摇动；与…掷币打赌

limb.中释: 切断…的手足；从…上截下树枝

lift.英释: a machine that you can ride in, that moves up and down between the floors in a tall building

chop.英释: to cut something into smaller pieces

rent.英释: to regularly pay money to live in a house or room that belongs to someone else, or to use something that belongs to someone else

diet.英释: to limit the amount and type of food that you eat, in order to become thinner

plea.中释: 恳求，请求；辩解，辩护；借口，托辞
plea.英释: a request that is urgent or full of emotion

beam.中释: 发送；以梁支撑；用…照射；流露
beam.英释: to send a radio or television signal through the air, especially to somewhere very distant

harm.英释: to have a bad effect on something

fork.英释: to put food into your mouth or onto a plate using a fork

hawk.中释: 鹰；鹰派成员；掠夺他人的人
hawk.英释: a large bird that hunts and eats small birds and animals

mock.中释: 仿制的，模拟的，虚假的，不诚实的
mock.英释: not real, but intended to be very similar to a real situation, substance etc

hate.英释: an angry unpleasant feeling that someone has when they hate someone and want to harm them

moan.英释: a long low sound expressing pain, unhappiness, or sexual pleasure

roll.英释: a piece of paper, camera film, money etc that has been rolled into the shape of a tube

norm.英释: the usual or normal situation, way of doing something etc

poke.英释: to quickly push your fingers, a stick etc into something or someone

sake.中释: 目的；利益；理由；日本米酒

curb.英释: to control or limit something in order to prevent it from having a harmful effect

fade.中释: [电影][电视] 淡出；[电影][电视] 淡入

rake.中释: 耙子；斜度；钱耙；放荡的人，浪子
rake.英释: a gardening tool with a row of metal teeth at the end of a long handle, used for making soil level, gathering up dead leaves etc

farm.英释: an area of land used for growing crops or keeping animals

taxi.英释: a car and driver that you pay to take you somewhere

bait.英释: food used to attract fish, animals, or birds so that you can catch them

brow.英释: the part of your face above your eyes and below your hair

gene.英释: a part of a cell in a living thing that controls what it looks like, how it grows, and how it develops. People get their genes from their parents

cage.中释: 把…关进笼子；把…囚禁起来
cage.英释: to put or keep an animal or bird in a cage

heel.英释: (of a vessel) to lean over; list

dawn.英释: if day or morning dawns, it begins

drip.中释: 水滴，滴水声；静脉滴注；使人厌烦的人
drip.英释: one of the drops of liquid that fall from something

grey.英释: the colour of dark clouds, neither black nor white

pity.中释: 对……表示怜悯；对……感到同情
pity.英释: to feel sorry for someone because they are in a very bad situation

echo.英释: a sound that you hear again after a loud noise, because it was made near something such as a wall

heir.英释: the person who has the legal right to receive the property or title of another person when they die

twin.英释: used to describe one of two children who are twins

axis.英释: the imaginary line around which a large round object, such as the Earth, turns

dine.中释: (Dine)人名；(意、葡)迪内；(英)戴恩；(法)迪纳

zeal.英释: eagerness to do something, especially to achieve a particular religious or political aim

menu.英释: a list of all the kinds of food that are available for a meal, especially in a restaurant

mend.英释: to be getting better after an illness or after a difficult period

memo.英释: a short official note to another person in the same company or organization

roar.英释: to make a deep, very loud noise

hell.中释: 该死；见鬼（表示惊奇、烦恼、厌恶、恼怒、失望等）
hell.英释: used when you are very angry with someone

dish.中释: 盛于碟盘中；分发；使某人的希望破灭；说（某人）的闲话
dish.英释: to give a lot of information about something or someone, especially something that would usually be secret or private

wrap.英释: a piece of thick cloth that a woman wears around her shoulders

herb.英释: a small plant that is used to improve the taste of food, or to make medicine

drum.英释: a musical instrument made of skin stretched over a circular frame, played by hitting it with your hand or a stick

dive.英释: a sudden movement in a particular direction or into a particular place

cave.英释: a large natural hole in the side of a cliff or hill, or under the ground

lick.英释: when you move your tongue across the surface of something

fuse.中释: 保险丝，熔线；导火线，雷管
fuse.英释: a short thin piece of wire inside electrical equipment which prevents damage by melting and stopping the electricity when there is too much power

fuss.中释: 大惊小怪，大惊小怪的人；小题大作；忙乱
fuss.英释: anxious behaviour or activity that is usually about unimportant things

iron.英释: You can use iron to describe the character or behaviour of someone who is very firm in their decisions and actions, or who can control their feelings well

sore.英释: a painful, often red, place on your body caused by a wound or infection

mute.英释: a small piece of metal, rubber etc that you place over or into a musical instrument to make it sound softer

vase.英释: a container used to put flowers in or for decoration

cart.英释: to take something somewhere in a cart, truck etc

song.英释: the musical sounds made by birds and some other animals such as  whales

chip.中释: [电子] 芯片；筹码；碎片；(食物的) 小片; 薄片
chip.英释: a small piece of wood, stone, metal etc that has been broken off something

chin.中释: 用下巴夹住；与…聊天；在单杠上作引体向上动作

camp.英释: a place where people stay in tents, shelters etc for a short time, usually in the mountains, a forest etc

pint.中释: 品脱；一品脱的量；一品脱牛奶或啤酒
pint.英释: a unit for measuring an amount of liquid, especially beer or milk. In Britain a pint is equal to 0.568 litres, and in the US it is equal to 0.473 litres.

cape.英释: a long loose piece of clothing without  sleeve s  that fastens around your neck and hangs from your shoulders

pill.中释: 把…制成丸剂；使服用药丸；抢劫，掠夺（古语）

limp.英释: the way someone walks when they are limping

heat.英释: to make something become warm or hot

heap.英释: to put a lot of things on top of each other in an untidy way

soil.英释: to make something dirty, especially with waste from your body

sofa.英释: a comfortable seat with raised arms and a back, that is wide enough for two or three people to sit on

soft.中释: 柔性；柔软的东西；柔软部分

soap.中释: 将肥皂涂在……上；对……拍马屁（俚语）
soap.英释: to rub soap on or over someone or something

soda.英释: water that contains bubbles and is often added to alcoholic drinks

chew.英释: to bite food several times before swallowing it

chef.英释: a skilled cook, especially the main cook in a hotel or restaurant

chap.英释: (of the skin) to make or become raw and cracked, esp by exposure to cold

snow.英释: if it snows, snow falls from the sky

reel.英释: a staggering or swaying motion or sensation

rust.英释: to become covered with rust, or to make something become covered in rust

bowl.中释: 玩保龄球；滑动；平稳快速移动
bowl.英释: to travel along very quickly and smoothly

dial.英释: to press the buttons or turn the dial on a telephone in order to make a telephone call

wine.英释: to entertain someone well with a meal, wine etc

wind.中释: 缠绕；上发条；使弯曲；吹号角；绕住或缠住某人
wind.英释: to turn or twist something several times around something else

wink.英释: a quick action of opening and closing one eye, usually as a signal to someone else

boil.英释: the act or state of boiling

edge.中释: 使锐利；将…开刃；给…加上边
edge.英释: to put something on the edge or border of something

wipe.英释: a wiping movement with a cloth

bolt.中释: 突然地；像箭似地；直立地
bolt.英释: If a person or animal bolts, they suddenly start to run very fast, often because something has frightened them

ruin.英释: to make someone lose all their money

watt.英释: a unit for measuring electrical power

bomb.英释: a weapon made of material that will explode

bond.英释: if two things bond with each other, they become firmly fixed together, especially after they have been joined with glue

bone.英释: to remove the bones from fish or meat

wash.英释: to clean something using water and a type of soap

stir.英释: to move a liquid or substance around with a spoon or stick in order to mix it together

sigh.英释: an act or sound of sighing

foam.中释: 起泡沫；吐白沫；起着泡沫流动

void.英释: to make a contract or agreement void so that it has no legal effect

stab.英释: an act of stabbing or trying to stab someone with a knife

ease.英释: Ease is the state of being very comfortable and able to live as you want, without any worries or problems

navy.英释: the part of a country’s military forces that fights at sea

weed.英释: a wild plant growing where it is not wanted that prevents crops or garden flowers from growing properly

bull.中释: 企图抬高证券价格；吓唬；强力实现

bend.英释: a curved part of something, especially a road or river

bury.中释: (Bury)人名；(法)比里；(英、西)伯里；(德、意、罗、波、捷、匈)布里；(俄)布雷

volt.中释: 伏特（电压单位）；环骑；闪避
volt.英释: a unit for measuring the force of an electric current

emit.英释: to send out gas, heat, light, sound etc

gang.中释: 使成群结队；结伙伤害或恐吓某人

sink.英释: a large open container that you fill with water and use for washing yourself, washing dishes etc

junk.英释: old or unwanted objects that have no use or value

sham.英释: made to appear real in order to deceive people

sail.英释: a large piece of strong cloth fixed onto a boat, so that the wind will push the boat along

deer.英释: a large wild animal that can run very fast, eats grass, and has horns

zinc.英释: a blue-white metal that is used to make brass and to cover and protect objects made of iron. It is a chemical element: symbol Zn

loop.英释: a shape like a curve or a circle made by a line curving back towards itself, or a piece of wire, string etc that has this shape

deck.英释: to decorate something with flowers, flags etc

dear.英释: You can call someone dear as a sign of affection

dean.中释: 院长；系主任；教务长；主持牧师
dean.英释: a priest of high rank in the Christian church who is in charge of several priests or churches

deaf.英释: physically unable to hear anything or unable to hear well

sack.英释: to dismiss someone from their job

door.英释: the large flat piece of wood, glass etc that you move when you go into or out of a building, room, vehicle etc, or when you open a cupboard

puff.中释: 粉扑；泡芙；蓬松；一阵喷烟；肿块；吹嘘，宣传广告

levy.英释: to officially say that people must pay a tax or charge

blur.英释: a shape that you cannot see clearly

knot.英释: to tie together two ends or pieces of string, rope, cloth etc

loaf.中释: 游荡；游手好闲；虚度光阴
loaf.英释: to spend time somewhere and not do very much

load.英释: to put a large quantity of something into a vehicle or container

plot.英释: to make a secret plan to harm a person or organization, especially a political leader or government

park.英释: to put a car or other vehicle in a particular place for a period of time

crow.英释: a large shiny black bird with a loud cry

pump.英释: a machine for forcing liquid or gas into or out of something

yawn.英释: to open your mouth wide and breathe in deeply because you are tired or bored

plug.中释: 塞住；用插头将与电源接通
plug.英释: to fill or block a small hole

ship.英释: a large boat used for carrying people or goods across the sea

pail.英释: a metal or wooden container with a handle, used for carrying liquids

spit.英释: the watery liquid that is produced in your mouth

spin.英释: an act of turning around quickly

noun.英释: a word or group of words that represent a person (such as ‘Michael’, ‘teacher’ or ‘police officer’), a place (such as ‘France’ or ‘school’), a thing or activity (such as ‘coffee’ or ‘football’), or a quality or idea (such as ‘danger’ or ‘happiness’). Nouns can be used as the subject or object of a verb (as in ‘The teacher arrived’ or ‘We like the teacher’) or as the object of a preposition (as in ‘good at football’).

pack.中释: 包装；压紧；捆扎；挑选；塞满
pack.英释: to put things into cases, bags etc ready for a trip somewhere

pact.英释: a formal agreement between two groups, countries, or people, especially to help each other or to stop fighting

lock.英释: a thing that keeps a door, drawer etc fastened and is usually opened with a key or by moving a small metal bar

haul.英释: to pull something heavy with a continuous steady movement

rope.英释: to tie things together using rope

roof.英释: to put a roof on a building

leak.英释: if a container, pipe, roof etc leaks, or if it leaks gas, liquid etc, there is a small hole or crack in it that lets gas or liquid flow through

glow.中释: 灼热；色彩鲜艳；兴高采烈

hill.英释: an area of land that is higher than the land around it, like a mountain but smaller

rape.英释: to force someone to have sex, especially by using violence

hike.英释: a long walk in the mountains or countryside

envy.英释: to wish that you had someone else’s possessions, abilities etc

hint.英释: to suggest something in an indirect way, but so that someone can guess your meaning

rash.中释: [皮肤] 皮疹；突然大量出现的事物
rash.英释: a lot of red spots on someone’s skin, caused by an illness

scar.英释: a feeling of fear or sadness that remains with you for a long time after an unpleasant experience

mate.英释: if animals mate, they have sex to produce babies

veto.英释: if someone in authority vetoes something, they refuse to allow it to happen, especially something that other people or organizations have agreed

verb.中释: 动词的；有动词性质的；起动词作用的

myth.中释: 神话；虚构的人，虚构的事
myth.英释: an ancient story, especially one invented in order to explain natural or historical events

scan.英释: a medical test in which a special machine produces a picture of something inside your body

milk.英释: to get as much money or as many advantages as you can from a situation, in a very determined and sometimes dishonest way

mild.英释: dark beer with a slightly sweet taste

skin.英释: to remove the skin from an animal, fruit, or vegetable

skim.中释: 脱脂的；撇去浮沫的；表层的

veil.中释: 遮蔽；掩饰；以面纱遮掩；用帷幕分隔
veil.英释: to cover something with a veil

vein.中释: 使成脉络；象脉络般分布于

blow.英释: if the wind or a current of air blows, it moves

arch.英释: to form or make something form a curved shape

oven.英释: a piece of equipment that food is cooked inside, shaped like a metal box with a door on the front

sane.中释: (Sane)人名；(日)实(姓)；(日)实(名)；(芬、塞、冈、几比、塞内)萨内

sand.中释: 撒沙于；以沙掩盖；用砂纸等擦平或磨光某物；使撒沙似地布满；给…掺沙子
sand.英释: to make a surface smooth by rubbing it with  sandpaper  or using a special piece of equipment

poll.中释: 无角的；剪过毛的；修过枝的

pole.英释: to push a boat along in the water using a pole

oval.英释: a shape like a circle, but wider in one direction than the other

neat.中释: 灵巧的；整洁的；优雅的；齐整的；未搀水的；平滑的

salt.中释: 用盐腌；给…加盐；将盐撒在道路上使冰或雪融化
salt.英释: to add salt to food to make it taste better

neck.英释: if two people are necking, they kiss for a long time in a sexual way

pond.英释: a small area of fresh water that is smaller than a lake, that is either natural or artificially made

curl.英释: a piece of hair that hangs in a curved shape

ring.中释: 戒指；铃声，钟声；拳击场；环形物
ring.英释: a piece of jewellery that you wear on your finger

riot.英释: if a crowd of people riot, they behave in a violent and uncontrolled way, for example by fighting the police and damaging cars or buildings

poem.英释: a piece of writing that expresses emotions, experiences, and ideas, especially in short lines using words that  rhyme (= end with the same sound )

oath.英释: a formal and very serious promise

wool.中释: 羊毛；毛线；绒线；毛织品；毛料衣物
wool.英释: the soft thick hair that sheep and some goats have on their body

raid.英释: if police raid a place, they make a surprise visit to search for something illegal

weld.英释: a joint that is made by welding two pieces of metal together

dump.中释: 垃圾场；仓库；无秩序地累积
dump.英释: a place where unwanted waste is taken and left

tube.中释: 使成管状；把…装管；用管输送

tuck.中释: 食物；船尾突出部；缝摺；抱膝式跳水；活力；鼓声
tuck.英释: a pleat or fold in a part of a garment, usually stitched down so as to make it a better fit or as decoration

wolf.英释: to eat something very quickly, swallowing it in big pieces

glad.中释: (Glad)人名；(塞、瑞典)格拉德；(英)格莱德；(法、挪)格拉

cube.中释: 使成立方形；使自乘二次；量…的体积
cube.英释: to multiply a number by itself twice

rack.英释: (of clouds) to be blown along by the wind

duck.英释: to push someone under water for a short time as a joke

tune.英释: to make a musical instrument play at the right  pitch

ride.中释: 骑；乘坐；交通工具；可供骑行的路；（乘坐汽车等的）旅行；乘骑；（乘车或骑车的）短途旅程；供乘骑的游乐设施
ride.英释: a journey in a vehicle, when you are not driving

fine.英释: in a way that is satisfactory or acceptable

clap.英释: the loud sound that you make when you hit your hands together many times to show that you enjoyed something

claw.英释: to tear or pull at something, using claws or your fingers

hose.英释: to wash or pour water over something or someone, using a hose

bath.英释: to wash someone in a bath

tilt.英释: a movement or position in which one side of something is higher than the other

aunt.英释: the sister of your father or mother, or the wife of your father’s or mother’s brother

bang.英释: to hit something hard, making a loud noise

fare.英释: the price you pay to travel somewhere by bus, train, plane etc

ally.英释: If you ally yourself with someone or something, you give your support to them

ache.英释: a continuous pain that is not sharp or very strong

tale.中释: 故事；传说；叙述；流言蜚语
tale.英释: a story about exciting imaginary events

tall.中释: (Tall)人名；(马里、阿拉伯)塔勒；(芬、罗、瑞典)塔尔；(英)托尔；(土)塔勒

kite.中释: 使用空头支票；像风筝一样飞；轻快地移动

tape.中释: 录音；用带子捆扎；用胶布把…封住
tape.英释: to record sound or pictures onto a tape

snap.英释: an election that is announced suddenly and unexpectedly

acre.英释: a unit for measuring area, equal to 4,840 square yards or 4,047 square metres

seal.英释: to cover the surface of something with something that will protect it

wife.英释: the woman that a man is married to

ugly.中释: 丑陋的；邪恶的；令人厌恶的
ugly.英释: extremely unattractive and unpleasant to look at

seed.英释: to remove seeds from fruit or vegetables

comb.英释: to make hair look tidy using a comb

cosy.英释: a covering for a  teapot  that keeps the tea inside from getting cold too quickly

unit.中释: 单位，单元；装置；[军] 部队；部件
unit.英释: an amount of something used as a standard of measurement

goat.中释: 山羊；替罪羊（美俚）；色鬼（美俚）
goat.英释: an animal that has horns on top of its head and long hair under its chin, and can climb steep hills and rocks. Goats live wild in the mountains or are kept as farm animals.

port.英释: to turn or be turned towards the port

bald.中释: (Bald)人名；(英)鲍尔德；(德、法、波)巴尔德

tick.英释: A tick is a small creature which lives on the bodies of people or animals and uses their blood as food

undo.英释: to open something that is tied, fastened or wrapped

howl.英释: a long loud sound made by a dog,  wolf  , or other animal

tray.中释: 托盘；文件盒；隔底匣；（无线电的）发射箱
tray.英释: a flat piece of plastic, metal, or wood, with raised edges, used for carrying things such as plates, food etc

smog.英释: dirty air that looks like a mixture of smoke and  fog  , caused by smoke from cars and factories in cities

coin.英释: a piece of metal, usually flat and round, that is used as money

coil.英释: a continuous series of circular rings into which something such as wire or rope has been wound or twisted

pope.中释: 教皇，罗马教皇；权威，大师
pope.英释: Thepope is the head of the Roman Catholic Church

lawn.英释: an area of ground in a garden or park that is covered with short grass

pear.英释: a sweet juicy fruit that has a round base and is thinner near the top, or the tree that produces this fruit

slum.中释: 贫民窟；陋巷；脏乱的地方
slum.英释: a house or an area of a city that is in very bad condition, where very poor people live

trip.英释: a visit to a place that involves a journey, for pleasure or a particular purpose

whip.中释: 鞭子；抽打；车夫；[机] 搅拌器
whip.英释: a long thin piece of rope or leather with a handle, that you hit animals with to make them move or that you hit someone with to punish them

flee.英释: to leave somewhere very quickly, in order to escape from danger

numb.英释: a part of your body that is numb is unable to feel anything, for example because you are very cold

lion.中释: 狮子；名人；勇猛的人；社交场合的名流
lion.英释: a large animal of the cat family that lives in Africa and parts of southern Asia. Lions have gold-coloured fur and the male has a mane(= long hair around its neck ).

atom.英释: the smallest part of an  element  that can exist alone or can combine with other substances to form a  molecule

lash.中释: 鞭打；睫毛；鞭子；责骂；讽刺
lash.英释: a hit with a whip, especially as a punishment

flat.中释: 逐渐变平；[音乐]以降调唱（或奏）

flap.中释: 拍动；神经紧张；鼓翼而飞；（帽边等）垂下
flap.英释: to behave in an excited or nervous way

flag.英释: an expression meaning a country or organization and its beliefs, values, and people

peel.英释: the skin of some fruits and vegetables, especially the thick skin of fruits such as oranges, which you do not eat

peep.中释: 窥视；慢慢露出，出现；吱吱叫
peep.英释: to look at something quickly and secretly, especially through a hole or opening

dash.英释: If you dash somewhere, you run or go there quickly and suddenly

slam.英释: the noise or action of a door, window etc slamming

lane.中释: 小巷；[航][水运] 航线；车道；罚球区
lane.英释: a narrow road in the countryside

lame.英释: to make a person or animal unable to walk properly

slim.中释: (Slim)人名；(阿拉伯)萨利姆；(英、西)斯利姆

damp.英释: slightly wet, often in an unpleasant way

king.中释: 主要的，最重要的，最大的

brim.英释: to have a lot of a particular thing, quality, or emotion

slit.英释: A slit is a long narrow opening in something

pest.中释: 害虫；有害之物；讨厌的人
pest.英释: a small animal or insect that destroys crops or food supplies

sway.英释: power to rule or influence people

lady.英释: used as the title of the wife or daughter of a British noblemanor the wife of a knight

very.英释: used to emphasize that you are talking exactly about one particular thing or person

time.英释: the thing that is measured in minutes, hours, days, years etc using clocks

view.英释: If you view something in a particular way, you think of it in that way.

base.英释: to have your main place of work, business etc in a particular place

fact.英释: a piece of information that is known to be true

side.英释: to support or argue against a person or group in a quarrel, fight etc

pale.中释: 苍白的,灰白的；浅的,暗淡的
pale.英释: having a skin colour that is very white, or whiter than it usually is

mark.英释: to write or draw on something, so that someone will notice what you have written

hers.英释: used to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned

form.英释: to establish an organization, committee, government etc

bank.英释: a business that keeps and lends money and provides other financial services

here.中释: 在(到，向)这里；这时；在这一点上

name.英释: to give someone or something a particular name

call.英释: a loud sound that a bird or animal makes

move.英释: something that you decide to do in order to achieve something

part.英释: to move the two sides of something apart, or to move apart, making a space in the middle
